item.title: Rsps help! :[
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:14, topic:351211”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=447571.msg3284811#msg3284811 date=1280130052]
Here are the steps to a decent RSPS, if not, a “good” RSPS.

1.) Learn JAVA - The language most sources are programmed in.
i.) It is suggested to also learn #C and C++
[/quote]
Lol’d at java statement, No servers teach you nothing close to java. All they teach you is if statements and brackets.
C# has nothing to do with any java based game.[/quote]

I said learn JAVA, not learn java from RSPS. I said learn JAVA first before going to start RSPS.

Some servers have C# and/or C++. So I don’t know what you’re on.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps help! :[
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:6, topic:351211”][quote author=THE DAD link=topic=447571.msg3284823#msg3284823 date=1280130635]
AWMG DAMN IT BUT I DELETED THE SOURCE AND CLIENT :[ AND IT TOOK ALOT OF EDITING TO THE CLIENT AND I DONT WANNA DO IT AGAIN IF ANY YOU COULD OR ANY ONE HELP ME MAKE A SIMPLE SERVER THATS ONLINE SUCH AS A 317 OR W.E THAT BE COOL AND ILL PAY BUT IT HAS TO BE A GOOD BUT SIMPLE ONE. (TEAMVIEWER) IF YOU HAVE THAT YOU CAN GO ON AND HELP ME IF ANY OF YOU HAVE
[/quote]

In the compiler/run there are two different commands

java

and

javac

java runs a class file
javac compiles a java file

If it can’t find it, declare the compiler like this

"C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_version$/bin/java.exe"

and vice versa.[/quote]Or… L2Set your enviromental tables.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps help! :[
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Here are the steps to a decent RSPS, if not, a “good” RSPS.

1.) Learn JAVA - The language most sources are programmed in.
i.) It is suggested to also learn #C and C++

2.) Download Hyperion 317, 459, or 474
i.) Learn the protocols
a.) Learn the Stream.class (and login encoding/decoding, anything that is used to communicate with the client)

3.) Focus on a massive player base
This means don’t focus on PKing or Economy. Focus on other types of players too. If you can provide all-around content, you should be successful.

Read full topic
